long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prima.Law Chrome Extension is a companion tool to your Prima.Law subscription.  Attorneys can use the extension to gather their clients information from CBP, USCIS and EOIR.  Soon you will see the ability to autofill the DS-160 and DS-260 forms from the Department of State's website too.  The Chrome extension automates the transfer of data from your Prima.Law account to and from government agency websites.
